title: Reliable Dock Worker
description: We have a moderately trustworthy professional relationship built on his consistent work at my Public Dock at Fondamenta delle Specchiere. While our trust level is nearly neutral (47.65/100), the relationship lacks significant strength (0.86/100), suggesting limited interaction beyond his employment. His remarkable financial success (317,989 Ducats) despite his humble Facchini status indicates he may be a valuable resource for future business ventures beyond simple dock operations.
